page.title: 20Houses and Home Life
page.content: The impression when walking around the block is one of quiet, tree lined streets with private houses ranging from small to mansions. There is very little council owned residential property and no council estates. House prices vary from Â£28,000 to 100,000 and although the majority of houses are 40 to 50 years old there are a number of fairly small modern estates. Most houses have gardens of not less than 80 feet and many considerably more. There are a number of three or four storey blocks of flats. These again are privately owned and in the luxury catagory. Retired or single people live here in the main. A door to door survey showed that nearly all homes contained TV, video and home computer and virtually all families owned a car, many owned two.
